32.ara-name: كتاب القدر عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:The testimony of a treacherous man is not acceptable nor a treacherous woman nor a man lashed for the Hadd nor a woman lashed nor one possessing malice of enmity nor a rehearsed witness nor the Qani of (one contracted by)the family on their behalf nor the one associating himself to other than his Wala or to other than his relatives

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ النَّفْسَ تَمُوتُ حَيْثُ مَا كُتِبَ لَهَا
